40 //==============================================================================
41 
42 Mixture::Mixture(const MixtureOptions& options)
43  : Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics(
44  options.getSpeciesDescriptor(),
45  options.getThermodynamicDatabase(),
46  options.getStateModel()),
47  Transport(
48  *this,
49  options.getViscosityAlgorithm(),
50  options.getThermalConductivityAlgorithm()),
51  Kinetics(
52  static_cast<const Thermodynamics&>(*this),
53  options.getMechanism()),
54  GasSurfaceInteraction(
55  *this,
56  *this,
57  options.getGSIMechanism())
58 {
59  // Add all the compositions given in mixture options to the composition list
60  for (int i = 0; i < options.compositions().size(); ++i)
61  addComposition(options.compositions()[i]);
62 
63  // Set default composition if available
64  if (options.hasDefaultComposition())
65  setDefaultComposition(m_compositions[options.getDefaultComposition()]);
66 
67  // Instantiate a new energy transfer model
68  state()->initializeTransferModel(*this);
69 
70 }
71 
72 //==============================================================================
73 
74 void Mixture::addComposition(const Composition& c, bool make_default)
75 {
76  // Check if all names in the composition are elements
77  bool elements = true;
78  for (int i = 0; i < c.size(); ++i) {
79  if (elementIndex(c[i].name) < 0) {
80  elements = false;
81 
82  if (speciesIndex(c[i].name) < 0) {
83  throw InvalidInputError("composition", c.name())
84  << "Composition has component which is not an element or "
85  << "species belonging to the mixture.";
86  }
87  }
88  }
89 
90  // If this composition has species names, then treat all as species and
91  // convert to elements
92  if (!elements) {
93  ArrayXd svals(nSpecies());
94  ArrayXd evals(nElements());
95  c.getComposition(m_species_indices, svals.data());
96 
97  if (c.type() == Composition::MASS)
98  convert<Y_TO_X>(svals.data(), svals.data());
99  convert<X_TO_XE>(svals.data(), evals.data());
100 
101  // Get list of element names
102  std::vector<std::string> names;
103  for (int i = 0; i < nElements(); ++i)
104  names.push_back(elementName(i));
105 
106  m_compositions.push_back(
107  Composition(names, evals.data(), Composition::MOLE));
108  } else
109  m_compositions.push_back(c);
110 
111  if (make_default)
112  setDefaultComposition(m_compositions.back());
113 }
114 
115 //==============================================================================
116 
117 bool Mixture::getComposition(
118  const std::string& name, double* const p_vec, Composition::Type type) const
119 {
120  int i = 0;
121  for ( ; i < m_compositions.size(); ++i)
122  if (m_compositions[i].name() == name) break;
123 
124  // Check if there is a composition with the given name
125  if (i == m_compositions.size())
126  return false;
127 
128  // Get the composition
129  m_compositions[i].getComposition(m_element_indices, p_vec);
130 
131  // Convert if necessary
132  if (m_compositions[i].type() != type) {
133  if (type == Composition::MOLE)
134  convert<YE_TO_XE>(p_vec, p_vec);
135  else
136  convert<XE_TO_YE>(p_vec, p_vec);
137  }
138 
139  return true;
140 }
